about_the_game:
Season 1 ends with a big bang and 3 unique vehicles!

Sweeper: This midsize racer is a perfect blend of agility, speed and toughness - a great all-rounder for every type of race!

Hearse: This banger racing classic excels at derbies since it can both give and take serious punishment.

Stock Car: A versatile little rocket that feels right at home on every oval and Figure 8 track!

This DLC pack is also included in the Season Pass.
detailed_description:
Season 1 ends with a big bang and 3 unique vehicles!

Sweeper: This midsize racer is a perfect blend of agility, speed and toughness - a great all-rounder for every type of race!

Hearse: This banger racing classic excels at derbies since it can both give and take serious punishment.

Stock Car: A versatile little rocket that feels right at home on every oval and Figure 8 track!

This DLC pack is also included in the Season Pass.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo 2.7 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce® GTX™ 460 or AMD Radeon™ HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32 or 64bit), Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX™ 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
